description: This Dart source file defines a provider class for managing user's favorite baby names within a Flutter application. It interacts with SharedPreferences to persist data and provides methods for loading, saving, toggling, adding, removing, and retrieving favorite names.

classes.name: FavoritesProvider
classes.description: A provider class managing favorite baby names, with persistence via SharedPreferences and change notifications supported through ChangeNotifier.

methods.name: loadFavorites
methods.description: Loads favorite IDs from SharedPreferences and updates the internal set.

methods.name: _saveFavorites
methods.description: Persists the current set of favorite IDs to SharedPreferences.

methods.name: isFavorite
methods.description: Checks if a given ID is marked as favorite.

methods.name: toggleFavorite
methods.description: Toggles the favorite status of a given BabyName object.

methods.name: getFavoriteNames
methods.description: Returns a list of BabyName objects that are marked as favorites.
